nodes.text: Home of the Knights of Silver Dawn

The home of the Knights of Silver Dawn was a settlement in the abandoned desert wastelands of the Oplovis sector planet Wind in the Heaven system. It housed a community that was supplied by the Knights of Silver Dawn, a civil mercenary group, which saw the settlement as its home. The settlement had been reclaimed from an abandoned artificial oasis; water supply was not an issue as the relevant equipment were still functional.
